   20: -module(ssl_dist_bench_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   23: 
   24: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% CT meta
   29: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: 
   34: %% Test cases
   35: -export(
   36:    [setup/1,
   37:     parallel_setup/1,
   38:     roundtrip/1,
   39:     sched_utilization/1,
   40:     mean_load_cpu_margin/1,
   41:     throughput_0/1,
   42:     throughput_64/1,
   43:     throughput_1024/1,
   44:     throughput_4096/1,
   45:     throughput_16384/1,
   46:     throughput_65536/1,
   47:     throughput_262144/1,
   48:     throughput_1048576/1]).
   49: 
   50: %% Debug
   51: -export([payload/1, roundtrip_runner/3, setup_runner/3, throughput_runner/4,
   52:         mem/0]).
   53: 
   54: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: 
   56: suite() -> [{ct_hooks, [{ts_install_cth, [{nodenames, 2}]}]}].
   57: 
   58: all() ->
   59:     [{group, smoketest}].
   60: 
   61: groups() ->
   62:     [{smoketest, protocols()},
   63:      {benchmark, protocols()},
   64:      %%
   65:      %% protocols()
   66:      {ssl,         ssl_backends()},
   67:      {cryptcookie, cryptcookie_backends()},
   68:      {plain,       categories()},
   69:      {socket,      categories()},
   70:      %%
   71:      %% ssl_backends()
   72:      {tls,  categories()},
   73:      {ktls, categories()},
   74:      %%
   75:      %% cryptcookie_backends()
   76:      {dist_cryptcookie_socket, categories()},
   77:      {cryptcookie_socket_ktls, categories()},
   78:      {dist_cryptcookie_inet,   categories()},
   79:      {cryptcookie_inet_ktls,   categories()},
   80:      {cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih, categories()},
   81:      %%
   82:      %% categories()
   83:      {setup, [{repeat, 1}],
   84:       [setup,
   85:        parallel_setup]},
   86:      {roundtrip, [{repeat, 1}], [roundtrip]},
   87:      {sched_utilization,[{repeat, 1}],
   88:       [sched_utilization,
   89:        mean_load_cpu_margin]},
   90:      {throughput, [{repeat, 1}],
   91:       [throughput_0,
   92:        throughput_64,
   93:        throughput_1024,
   94:        throughput_4096,
   95:        throughput_16384,
   96:        throughput_65536,
   97:        throughput_262144,
   98:        throughput_1048576]}].
   99: 
  100: protocols() ->
  101:     [{group, ssl},
  102:      {group, cryptcookie},
  103:      {group, plain},
  104:      {group, socket}].
  105: 
  106: ssl_backends() ->
  107:     [{group, tls},
  108:      {group, ktls}].
  109: 
  110: cryptcookie_backends() ->
  111:     [{group, dist_cryptcookie_socket},
  112:      {group, cryptcookie_socket_ktls},
  113:      {group, dist_cryptcookie_inet},
  114:      {group, cryptcookie_inet_ktls},
  115:      {group, cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih}].
  116: 
  117: categories() ->
  118:     [{group, setup},
  119:      {group, roundtrip},
  120:      {group, throughput},
  121:      {group, sched_utilization}
  122:     ].
  123: 
  124: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  125:     Digest = sha256,
  126:     ECCurve = secp521r1,
  127: %%%     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.2',
  128: %%%     TLSCipher =
  129: %%%         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  130: %%%           cipher       => aes_128_cbc,
  131: %%%           mac          => sha256,
  132: %%%           prf          => sha256},
  133:     TLSVersion = 'tlsv1.3',
  134:     TLSCipher =
  135:         #{key_exchange => ecdhe_ecdsa,
  136:           cipher       => aes_256_gcm,
  137:           mac          => aead,
  138:           prf          => sha384},
  139:     %%
  140:     Node = node(),
  141:     Skip = make_ref(),
  142:     try
  143:         Node =/= nonode@nohost orelse
  144:             throw({Skip,"Node not distributed"}),
  145:         verify_node_src_addr(),
  146:         {supported, SSLVersions} =
  147:             lists:keyfind(supported, 1, ssl:versions()),
  148:         lists:member(TLSVersion, SSLVersions) orelse
  149:             throw(
  150:               {Skip,
  151:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSVersion)}),
  152: %%%         lists:member(ECCurve, ssl:eccs(TLSVersion)) orelse
  153: %%%             throw(
  154: %%%               {Skip,
  155: %%%                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(ECCurve)}),
  156:         TLSCipherKeys = maps:keys(TLSCipher),
  157:         lists:any(
  158:           fun (Cipher) ->
  159:                   maps:with(TLSCipherKeys, Cipher) =:= TLSCipher
  160:           end,
  161:           ssl:cipher_suites(default, TLSVersion)) orelse
  162:             throw(
  163:               {Skip,
  164:                "SSL does not support " ++ term_to_string(TLSCipher)}),
  165:         %%
  166:         %%
  167:         %%
  168:         CertOptions =
  169:             [{digest, Digest},
  170:              {key, {namedCurve, ECCurve}}],
  171:         RootCert =
  172:             public_key:pkix_test_root_cert(
  173:               ?MODULE_STRING ++ " ROOT CA", CertOptions),
  174:         SSLConf =
  175:             [{verify, verify_peer},
  176:              {versions, [TLSVersion]},
  177:              {ciphers, [TLSCipher]}],
  178:         ServerConf =
  179:             [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  180:              {verify_fun,
  181:               {fun inet_tls_dist:verify_client/3,[]}}
  182:             | SSLConf],
  183:         ClientConf = SSLConf,
  184:         %%
  185:         PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  186:         %%
  187:         ServerNode = ssl_bench_test_lib:setup(dist_server),
  188:         [_, ServerHost] = split_node(ServerNode),
  189:         ServerName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_server",
  190:         ServerString = ServerName ++ "@" ++ ServerHost,
  191:         ServerConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ServerString ++ ".conf"),
  192:         Server = list_to_atom(ServerString),
  193:         %%
  194:         write_node_conf(
  195:           ServerConfFile, Server, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  196:           CertOptions, RootCert),
  197:         %%
  198:         Schedulers =
  199:             erpc:call(ServerNode, erlang, system_info, [schedulers]),
  200:         [_, ClientHost] = split_node(Node),
  201:         [{server_node, ServerNode},
  202:          {server_name, ServerName},
  203:          {server, Server},
  204:          {server_dist_args,
  205:           "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  206:           "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ServerConfFile ++ " "},
  207:          {clients, Schedulers} |
  208:          init_client_node(
  209:            ClientHost, Schedulers, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  210:            CertOptions, RootCert, Config)]
  211:     catch
  212:         throw : {Skip, Reason} ->
  213:             {skip, Reason};
  214:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  215:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  216:     end.
  217: 
  218: init_client_node(
  219:   _ClientHost, 0, _PrivDir, _ServerConf, _ClientConf,
  220:   _CertOptions, _RootCert, Config) ->
  221:     Config;
  222: init_client_node(
  223:   ClientHost, N, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  224:   CertOptions, RootCert, Config) ->
  225:     ClientName = ?MODULE_STRING ++ "_client_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  226:     ClientString = ClientName ++ "@" ++ ClientHost,
  227:     ClientConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, ClientString ++ ".conf"),
  228:     Client = list_to_atom(ClientString),
  229:     %%
  230:     write_node_conf(
  231:       ClientConfFile, Client, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  232:       CertOptions, RootCert),
  233:     init_client_node(
  234:       ClientHost, N - 1, PrivDir, ServerConf, ClientConf,
  235:       CertOptions, RootCert,
  236:       [{{client_name, N}, ClientName},
  237:        {{client, N}, Client},
  238:        {{client_dist_args, N},
  239:         "-proto_dist inet_tls "
  240:         "-ssl_dist_optfile " ++ ClientConfFile ++ " "} | Config]).
  241: 
  242: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  243:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
  244:     ssl_bench_test_lib:cleanup(ServerNode).
  245: 
  246: init_per_group(benchmark, Config) ->
  247:     [{effort,10}|Config];
  248: %%
  249: init_per_group(ssl, Config) ->
  250:     [{ssl_dist, true}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "SSL"}|Config];
  251: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_socket, Config) ->
  252:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_socket:supported() of
  253:         ok ->
  254:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket"},
  255:              {ssl_dist_args,
  256:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_socket"}
  257:             | Config];
  258:         Problem ->
  259:             {skip, Problem}
  260:     catch
  261:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  262:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  263:     end;
  264: init_per_group(cryptcookie_socket_ktls, Config) ->
  265:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_socket_ktls:supported() of
  266:         ok ->
  267:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Socket-kTLS"},
  268:              {ssl_dist_args,
  269:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_socket_ktls"}
  270:             | Config];
  271:         Problem ->
  272:             {skip, Problem}
  273:     catch
  274:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  275:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  276:     end;
  277: init_per_group(dist_cryptcookie_inet, Config) ->
  278:     try inet_epmd_dist_cryptcookie_inet:supported() of
  279:         ok ->
  280:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet"},
  281:              {ssl_dist_args,
  282:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd dist_cryptcookie_inet"}
  283:             | Config];
  284:         Problem ->
  285:             {skip, Problem}
  286:     catch
  287:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  288:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  289:     end;
  290: init_per_group(cryptcookie_inet_ktls, Config) ->
  291:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_inet_ktls:supported() of
  292:         ok ->
  293:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet-kTLS"},
  294:              {ssl_dist_args,
  295:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_inet_ktls "
  296:               "-inet_ktls port"}
  297:             | Config];
  298:         Problem ->
  299:             {skip, Problem}
  300:     catch
  301:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  302:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  303:     end;
  304: init_per_group(cryptcookie_inet_ktls_ih, Config) ->
  305:     try inet_epmd_cryptcookie_inet_ktls:supported() of
  306:         ok ->
  307:             [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Crypto-Inet-kTLS-IH"},
  308:              {ssl_dist_args,
  309:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd cryptcookie_inet_ktls "
  310:               "-inet_ktls input_handler"}
  311:             | Config];
  312:         Problem ->
  313:             {skip, Problem}
  314:     catch
  315:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  316:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  317:     end;
  318: init_per_group(plain, Config) ->
  319:     [{ssl_dist, false}, {ssl_dist_prefix, "Plain"}|Config];
  320: %%
  321: init_per_group(socket, Config) ->
  322:     try inet_epmd_socket:supported() of
  323:         ok ->
  324:             [{ssl_dist, false},
  325:              {ssl_dist_prefix, "Socket"},
  326:              {ssl_dist_args,
  327:               "-proto_dist inet_epmd -inet_epmd socket"}
  328:             | Config];
  329:         Problem ->
  330:             {skip, Problem}
  331:     catch
  332:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  333:             {fail, {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}}
  334:     end;
  335: %%
  336: init_per_group(ktls, Config) ->
  337:     case ktls_supported() of
  338:         ok ->
  339:             [{ktls, true},
  340:              {ssl_dist_prefix,
  341:               proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config) ++ "-kTLS"}
  342:             | proplists:delete(ssl_dist_prefix, Config)];
  343:         {error, Reason} ->
  344:             {skip, Reason}
  345:     end;
  346: %%
  347: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  348:     Config.
  349: 
  350: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  351:     ok.
  352: 
  353: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
  354:     case proplists:is_defined(effort, Conf) of
  355:         false ->
  356:             %% Not a benchmark run
  357:             case atom_to_list(Func) of
  358:                 "throughput_64" ->
  359:                     Conf;
  360:                 "throughput_"++_ ->
  361:                     {skipped, "Benchmarks run separately"};
  362:                 _ ->
  363:                     Conf
  364:             end;
  365:         true ->
  366:             Conf
  367:     end.
  368: 
  369: end_per_testcase(_Func, _Conf) ->
  370:     ok.
  371: 
  372: 
  373: ktls_supported() ->
  374:     {ok, Listen} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{active, false}]),
  375:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
  376:     {ok, Client} =
  377:         gen_tcp:connect({127,0,0,1}, Port, [{active, false}]),
  378:     try
  379:         maybe
  380:             {ok, OS} ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_os(),
  381:             ok ?= ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_ulp(Client, OS),
  382:             ssl_test_lib:ktls_set_cipher(Client, OS, tx, 1)
  383:         end
  384:     after
  385:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Client),
  386:         _ = gen_tcp:close(Listen)
  387:     end.
  388: 
  389: 
  390: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  391: %%% CommonTest API helpers
  392: 
  393: verify_node_src_addr() ->
  394:     Msg = "Hello, world!",
  395:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
  396:     {ok,DstAddr} = inet:getaddr(Host, inet),
  397:     {ok,Socket} = gen_udp:open(0, [{active,false}]),
  398:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Socket),
  399:     ok = gen_udp:send(Socket, DstAddr, Port, Msg),
  400:     %% Ubuntu has got 127.0.1.1 in /etc/hosts, but that IP address is
  401:     %% not assigned to the interface.
  402:     %% `ip addr add 127.0.1.1 dev lo` as root solves that problem
  403:     case gen_udp:recv(Socket, length(Msg) + 1, 1000) of
  404:         {ok,{DstAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  405:             ok;
  406:         {ok,{SrcAddr,Port,Msg}} ->
  407:             throw({skipped,
  408:                    "Src and dst address mismatch: " ++
  409:                        term_to_string(SrcAddr) ++ " =:= " ++
  410:                        term_to_string(DstAddr)});
  411:         Weird ->
  412:             error(Weird)
  413:     end.
  414: 
  415: write_node_conf(
  416:   ConfFile, Node, ServerConf, ClientConf, CertOptions, RootCert) ->
  417:     [Name,Host] = split_node(Node),
  418:     Conf =
  419:         public_key:pkix_test_data(
  420:           #{root => RootCert,
  421:             peer =>
  422:                 [{extensions,
  423:                   [
  424:                    #'Extension'{
  425:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  426:                       extnValue = [{dNSName, Host}],
  427:                       critical = true},
  428:                    #'Extension'{
  429:                       extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  430:                       extnValue =
  431:                           [{directoryName,
  432:                             {rdnSequence,
  433:                              [[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{
  434:                                   type = ?'id-at-commonName',
  435:                                   value =
  436:                                       {utf8String,
  437:                                        unicode:characters_to_binary(
  438:                                          Name, utf8)
  439:                                       }
  440:                                  }]]}}],
  441:                       critical = true}
  442:                   ]} | CertOptions]}),
  443:     NodeConf =
  444:         [{server, ServerConf ++ Conf}, {client, ClientConf ++ Conf}],
  445:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(ConfFile, [write]),
  446:     ok = file:change_mode(ConfFile, 8#400),
  447:     io:format(Fd, "~p.~n", [NodeConf]),
  448:     ok = file:close(Fd).
  449: 
  450: split_node(Node) ->
  451:     string:split(atom_to_list(Node), "@").
  452: 
  453: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  454: %%% Test cases
  455: 
  456: %%-----------------------
  457: %% Connection setup speed
  458: 
  459: setup(Config) ->
  460:     run_nodepair_test(fun setup/6, Config).
  461: 
  462: setup(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  463:     Rounds = 100 * Effort,
  464:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  465:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  466:     pong = ssl_apply(HA, net_adm, ping, [B]),
  467:     _ = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  468:     {Log, Before, After} =
  469:         ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  470:     ?CT_PAL("Server CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s", [Before, After, Log]),
  471:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  472:     ChildCountResult =
  473:         ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(
  474:           HA, supervisor, count_children, [tls_dist_connection_sup]),
  475:     ?CT_LOG("TLS Connection Child Count Result: ~p", [ChildCountResult]),
  476:     {SetupTime, CycleTime} =
  477:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> setup_runner(A, B, Rounds) end),
  478:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, fun () -> setup_wait_nodedown(A, 10000) end),
  479:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  480:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  481:     %% [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  482:     SetupSpeed = round((Rounds*1000000*1000) / SetupTime),
  483:     CycleSpeed = round((Rounds*1000000*1000) / CycleTime),
  484:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  485:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  486:     _ = report(Prefix++" Setup", SetupSpeed, "setups/1000s"),
  487:     report(Prefix++" Setup Cycle", CycleSpeed, "cycles/1000s " ++ MemSuffix).
  488: 
  489: %% Runs on node A against rex in node B
  490: setup_runner(A, B, Rounds) ->
  491:     StartTime = start_time(),
  492:     SetupTime = setup_loop(A, B, 0, Rounds),
  493:     {microseconds(SetupTime), microseconds(elapsed_time(StartTime))}.
  494: 
  495: setup_loop(_A, _B, T, 0) ->
  496:     T;
  497: setup_loop(A, B, T, N) ->
  498:     StartTime = start_time(),
  499:     try erpc:call(B, net_adm, ping, [A]) of
  500:         pong -> ok;
  501:         Other ->
  502:             error({N,Other})
  503:     catch
  504:         Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  505:             erlang:raise(Class, {N,Reason}, Stacktrace)
  506:     end,
  507:     Time = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  508:     [N,B] = [N|erlang:nodes()],
  509:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, {rex,B}),
  510:     true = net_kernel:disconnect(B),
  511:     receive
  512:         {'DOWN',Mref,process,_,_} ->
  513:             [] = erlang:nodes(),
  514:             setup_loop(A, B, Time + T, N - 1)
  515:     end.
  516: 
  517: setup_wait_nodedown(A, Time) ->
  518:     ok = net_kernel:monitor_nodes(true),
  519:     case nodes() of
  520:         [] ->
  521:             ok;
  522:         [A] ->
  523:             receive
  524:                 {nodedown,A} ->
  525:                     ok;
  526:                 Unexpected ->
  527:                     {error,{unexpected,Unexpected}}
  528:             after Time ->
  529:                     {error,timeout}
  530:             end
  531:     end.
  532: 
  533: 
  534: set_cpu_affinity(client) ->
  535:     set_cpu_affinity(1);
  536: set_cpu_affinity(server) ->
  537:     set_cpu_affinity(2);
  538: set_cpu_affinity(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
  539:     case erlang:system_info(cpu_topology) of
  540:         undefined ->
  541:             {"", undefined, undefined};
  542:         CpuTopology ->
  543:             Log = taskset(element(Index, split_cpus(CpuTopology))),
  544:             %% Update Schedulers
  545:             _ = erlang:system_info(update_cpu_info),
  546:             Schedulers = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  547:             {Log,
  548:              erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, Schedulers),
  549:              Schedulers}
  550:     end.
  551: 
  552: taskset(LogicalProcessors) ->
  553:     os:cmd(
  554:       "taskset -c -p " ++
  555:           lists:flatten(
  556:             lists:join(
  557:               ",",
  558:               [integer_to_list(Id) || Id <- LogicalProcessors]),
  559:             " ") ++ os:getpid()).
  560: 
  561: split_cpus([{_Tag, List}]) ->
  562:     split_cpus(List);
  563: split_cpus(List = [_ | _]) ->
  564:     {A, B} = lists:split(length(List) bsr 1, List),
  565:     {logical_processors(A), logical_processors(B)}.
  566: 
  567: logical_processors([{_Tag, {logical, Id}} | Items]) ->
  568:     [Id | logical_processors(Items)];
  569: logical_processors([{_Tag, List} | Items]) ->
  570:     logical_processors(List) ++ logical_processors(Items);
  571: logical_processors([]) ->
  572:     [].
  573: 
  574: 
  575: %%----------------
  576: %% Parallel setup
  577: 
  578: parallel_setup(Config) ->
  579:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  580:     parallel_setup(Config, Clients, Clients, []).
  581: 
  582: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I, HNs) when 0 < I ->
  583:     Key = {client, I},
  584:     Node = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  585:     Handle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config),
  586:     _ = ssl_apply(Handle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(client) end),
  587:     try
  588:         parallel_setup(Config, Clients, I - 1, [{Handle, Node} | HNs])
  589:     after
  590:         stop_ssl_node(Key, Handle, Config)
  591:     end;
  592: parallel_setup(Config, Clients, _0, HNs) ->
  593:     Key = server,
  594:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(Key, Config),
  595:     ServerHandle = start_ssl_node(Key, Config, 0),
  596:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
  597:     TotalRounds = 1000 * Effort,
  598:     Rounds = round(TotalRounds / Clients),
  599:     try
  600:         {Log, Before, After} =
  601:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun () -> set_cpu_affinity(server) end),
  602:         ?CT_PAL("Server CPU affinity: ~w -> ~w~n~s", [Before, After, Log]),
  603:         ServerMemBefore =
  604:             ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  605:         parallel_setup_result(
  606:           Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore,
  607:           [parallel_setup_runner(Handle, Node, ServerNode, Rounds)
  608:            || {Handle, Node} <- HNs])
  609:     after
  610:         stop_ssl_node(Key, ServerHandle, Config)
  611:     end.
  612: 
  613: parallel_setup_runner(Handle, Node, ServerNode, Rounds) ->
  614:     Collector = self(),
  615:     Tag = make_ref(),
  616:     _ =
  617:         spawn_link(
  618:           fun () ->
  619:                   Collector !
  620:                       {Tag,
  621:                        try
  622:                            MemBefore =
  623:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  624:                            Result =
  625:                                ssl_apply(
  626:                                  Handle, ?MODULE, setup_runner,
  627:                                  [Node, ServerNode, Rounds]),
  628:                            MemAfter =
  629:                                ssl_apply(Handle, fun mem/0),
  630:                            {MemBefore, Result, MemAfter}
  631:                        catch Class : Reason : Stacktrace ->
  632:                                {Class, Reason, Stacktrace}
  633:                        end}
  634:           end),
  635:     Tag.
  636: 
  637: parallel_setup_result(
  638:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags) ->
  639:     parallel_setup_result(
  640:       Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  641:       0, 0, 0).
  642: %%
  643: parallel_setup_result(
  644:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [Tag | Tags],
  645:   SetupTime, CycleTime, Mem) ->
  646:     receive
  647:         {Tag, {Mem1, {ST, CT}, Mem2}}
  648:           when is_integer(ST), is_integer(CT) ->
  649:             parallel_setup_result(
  650:               Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, Tags,
  651:               SetupTime + ST, CycleTime + CT, Mem + Mem2 - Mem1);
  652:         {Tag, Error} ->
  653:             exit(Error)
  654:     end;
  655: parallel_setup_result(
  656:   Config, TotalRounds, ServerHandle, ServerMemBefore, [],
  657:   SetupTime, CycleTime, Mem) ->
  658:     ServerMemAfter =
  659:         ssl_apply(ServerHandle, fun mem/0),
  660:     ServerMem = ServerMemAfter - ServerMemBefore,
  661:     Clients = proplists:get_value(clients, Config),
  662:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  663:     SetupSpeed = 1000 * round(TotalRounds / (SetupTime/1000000)),
  664:     CycleSpeed = 1000 * round(TotalRounds / (CycleTime/1000000)),
  665:     {MemC, MemS, MemSuffix} = mem_result({Mem / Clients, ServerMem}),
  666:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Clients", MemC, "KByte"),
  667:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup Mem Server", MemS, "KByte"),
  668:     _ = report(Prefix++" Parallel Setup", SetupSpeed, "setups/1000s"),
  669:     report(
  670:       Prefix++" Parallel Setup Cycle", CycleSpeed, "cycles/1000s "
  671:       ++ MemSuffix).
  672: 
  673: %%----------------
  674: %% Roundtrip speed
  675: 
  676: roundtrip(Config) ->
  677:     run_nodepair_test(fun roundtrip/6, Config).
  678: 
  679: roundtrip(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  680:     Rounds = 4000 * Effort,
  681:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  682:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  683:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  684:     ok = ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, allow, [[B]]),
  685:     ok = ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, allow, [[A]]),
  686:     Time = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> roundtrip_runner(A, B, Rounds) end),
  687:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  688:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  689:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  690:     Speed = round((Rounds*1000000) / Time),
  691:     _ = report(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  692:     _ = report(Prefix++" Roundtrip Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  693:     report(Prefix++" Roundtrip", Speed, "pings/s " ++ MemSuffix).
  694: 
  695: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  696: roundtrip_runner(A, B, Rounds) ->
  697:     ClientPid = self(),
  698:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  699:     ServerPid =
  700:         erlang:spawn(
  701:           B,
  702:           fun () ->
  703:                   roundtrip_server(ClientPid, Rounds)
  704:           end),
  705:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
  706:     roundtrip_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, start_time(), Rounds).
  707: 
  708: roundtrip_server(_Pid, 0) ->
  709:     exit(ok);
  710: roundtrip_server(Pid, N) ->
  711:     receive
  712:         N ->
  713:             Pid ! N,
  714:             roundtrip_server(Pid, N-1)
  715:     end.
  716: 
  717: roundtrip_client(_Pid, Mon, StartTime, 0) ->
  718:     Time = elapsed_time(StartTime),
  719:     receive
  720:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, ok} ->
  721:             Time;
  722:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
  723:             exit(Other)
  724:     end;
  725: roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, N) ->
  726:     Pid ! N,
  727:     receive
  728:         N ->
  729:             roundtrip_client(Pid, Mon, StartTime, N - 1)
  730:     end.
  731: 
  732: %%---------------------------------------
  733: %% Scheduler utilization at constant load
  734: 
  735: 
  736: sched_utilization(Config) ->
  737:     run_nodepair_test(
  738:       fun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  739:               sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config)
  740:       end, Config).
  741: 
  742: sched_utilization(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB, Config) ->
  743:     SSL = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config),
  744:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  745:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  746:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  747:     PidA = ssl_apply(HA, os, getpid, []),
  748:     PidB = ssl_apply(HB, os, getpid, []),
  749:     ?CT_PAL("Starting scheduler utilization run effort ~w:~n"
  750:            "    [~s] ~w~n"
  751:            "    [~s] ~w~n",
  752:            [Effort, PidA, A, PidB, B]),
  753:     {ClientMsacc, ServerMsacc, BusyDistPortMsgs} =
  754:         ssl_apply(
  755:           HA,
  756:           fun () ->
  757:                   Result = sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, SSL, Config),
  758:                   fs_log(
  759:                     Config,
  760:                     "sched_utilization.Result", Result),
  761:                   Result
  762:           end),
  763:     ?CT_LOG("Got ~p busy_dist_port msgs",[tail(BusyDistPortMsgs)]),
  764:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  765:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  766:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  767:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [A]),
  768:     msacc:print(ClientMsacc),
  769:     ?CT_LOG("Microstate accounting for node ~w:", [B]),
  770:     msacc:print(ServerMsacc),
  771:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of B from A: ~p",
  772:            [ssl_apply(HA, net_kernel, node_info, [B])]),
  773:     ?CT_LOG("Stats of A from B: ~p",
  774:            [ssl_apply(HB, net_kernel, node_info, [A])]),
  775:     SchedUtilClient =
  776:         round(10000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ClientMsacc) /
  777:                   msacc:stats(system_realtime,ClientMsacc)),
  778:     SchedUtilServer =
  779:         round(10000 * msacc:stats(system_runtime,ServerMsacc) /
  780:                   msacc:stats(system_realtime,ServerMsacc)),
  781:     Verdict =
  782:         if
  783:             BusyDistPortMsgs =:= 0 ->
  784:                 "";
  785:             is_integer(BusyDistPortMsgs) ->
  786:                 " ?";
  787:             true ->
  788:                 ?CT_LOG("Stray Msgs: ~p", [BusyDistPortMsgs]),
  789:                 " ???"
  790:         end,
  791:     _ = report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Client Mem", MemA, "KByte"),
  792:     _ = report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server Mem", MemB, "KByte"),
  793:     {comment, ClientComment} =
  794:         report(Prefix ++ " Sched Utilization Client" ++ Verdict,
  795:                SchedUtilClient, " %" ++ Verdict),
  796:     {comment, ServerComment} =
  797:         report(Prefix++" Sched Utilization Server" ++ Verdict,
  798:                SchedUtilServer, " %" ++ Verdict),
  799:     {comment,
  800:      "Client " ++ ClientComment ++ ", Server " ++ ServerComment ++
  801:          " " ++ MemSuffix}.
  802: 
  803: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
  804: %% We want to avoid getting busy_dist_port as it hides the true SU usage
  805: %% of the receiver and sender.
  806: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, true, Config) ->
  807:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 100, Config);
  808: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, false, Config) ->
  809:     sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, 100, Config);
  810: sched_util_runner(A, B, Effort, Senders, Config) ->
  811:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  812:     Payload = payload(100),
  813:     Time = 1000 * Effort,
  814:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
  815:     ServerPids =
  816:         [erlang:spawn_link(
  817:            B, fun () -> throughput_server() end)
  818:          || _ <- lists:seq(1, Senders)],
  819:     Tag = make_ref(),
  820:     ServerMsacc =
  821:         erlang:spawn_link(
  822:           B,
  823:           fun() ->
  824:                   receive
  825:                       {start,Tag,Pid} ->
  826:                           fs_log(
  827:                             Config,
  828:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc.self",
  829:                             self()),
  830:                           msacc:start(Time),
  831:                           fs_log(
  832:                             Config,
  833:                             "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:start",
  834:                             ok),
  835:                           receive
  836:                               {done,Tag,Pid} ->
  837:                                   fs_log(
  838:                                     Config,
  839:                                     "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  840:                                     ok),
  841:                                   ServerStats = msacc:stats(),
  842:                                   fs_log(Config,
  843:                                          "sched_util_runner.Server.msacc:stats",
  844:                                          ServerStats),
  845:                                   exit({result,Tag,ServerStats})
  846:                           end
  847:                   end
  848:           end),
  849:     erlang:system_monitor(self(),[busy_dist_port]),
  850:     %% We spawn 100 senders that send a message every 10 ms
  851:     %% which should produce a load of 10000 msgs/s with
  852:     %% payload 100 bytes each -> 1 MByte/s
  853:     _Clients =
  854:         [spawn_link(
  855:            fun() ->
  856:                    throughput_client(Pid, Payload)
  857:            end) || Pid <- ServerPids],
  858:     %%
  859:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  860:     ServerMsacc ! {start,Tag,self()},
  861:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.self", self()),
  862:     msacc:start(Time),
  863:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc:start", ok),
  864:     ClientMsaccStats = msacc:stats(),
  865:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.Client.msacc.stats", ClientMsaccStats),
  866:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  867:     ServerMsacc ! {done,Tag,self()},
  868:     ServerMsaccStats =
  869:         receive
  870:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,{result,Tag,Stats}} ->
  871:                 Stats;
  872:             {'EXIT',ServerMsacc,Other} ->
  873:                 exit({other,ServerMsacc,Other})
  874:         end,
  875:     fs_log(Config, "sched_util_runner.ServerMsaccStats", ServerMsaccStats),
  876:     %%
  877:     {ClientMsaccStats,ServerMsaccStats, busy_dist_port_msgs()}.
  878: 
  879: fs_log(Config, Name, Term) ->
  880:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  881:     DistPrefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
  882:     _ = file:write_file(
  883:           filename:join(PrivDir, DistPrefix ++ "_" ++ Name),
  884:           io_lib:format(
  885:             "~p~n",
  886:             [{{erlang:unique_integer([positive,monotonic]),
  887:                os:system_time(1000000)},
  888:              Term}])),
  889:     ok.
  890: 
  891: busy_dist_port_msgs() ->
  892:     busy_dist_port_msgs(0).
  893: %%
  894: busy_dist_port_msgs(N) ->
  895:     receive
  896:         M ->
  897:             case M of
  898:                 {monitor, P1, busy_dist_port, P2}
  899:                   when is_pid(P1), is_pid(P2) ->
  900:                     busy_dist_port_msgs(N + 1);
  901:                 Stray ->
  902:                     [Stray | busy_dist_port_msgs(N)]
  903:             end
  904:     after 0 ->
  905:             N
  906:     end.
  907: 
  908: tail([_|Tail]) ->
  909:     tail(Tail);
  910: tail(Tail) ->
  911:     Tail.
  912: 
  913: throughput_server() ->
  914:     receive _ -> ok end,
  915:     receive _ -> ok end,
  916:     receive _ -> ok end,
  917:     receive _ -> ok end,
  918:     receive _ -> ok end,
  919:     receive _ -> ok end,
  920:     receive _ -> ok end,
  921:     receive _ -> ok end,
  922:     receive _ -> ok end,
  923:     receive _ -> ok end,
  924:     throughput_server().
  925: 
  926: throughput_client(Pid, Payload) ->
  927:     Pid ! Payload,
  928:     receive after 10 -> throughput_client(Pid, Payload) end.
  929: 
  930: %%-----------------
  931: %% Mean load CPU margin
  932: %%
  933: %% Start pairs of processes with the client on node A
  934: %% and the server on node B.  The clients sends requests
  935: %% with random interval and payload and the servers reply
  936: %% immediately.
  937: %%
  938: %% Also, besides each server there is a compute process
  939: %% that does CPU work with low process priority and we measure
  940: %% how much such work that gets done.
  941: 
  942: mean_load_cpu_margin(Config) ->
  943:     run_nodepair_test(fun run_mlcm/6, Config).
  944: 
  945: -define(MLCM_NO, 100).
  946: 
  947: run_mlcm(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
  948:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
  949:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
  950:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
  951:     pong = ssl_apply(HB, net_adm, ping, [A]),
  952:     Count = ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> mlcm(B, Effort) end),
  953:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
  954:     _ = report(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
  955:     _ = report(Prefix++" CPU Margin Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
  956:     report(
  957:       Prefix++" CPU Margin",
  958:       round(Count/?MLCM_NO/Effort),
  959:       "stones " ++ MemSuffix).
  960: 
  961: mlcm(Node, Effort) ->
  962:     Payloads = mlcm_payloads(),
  963:     Clients =
  964:         [mlcm_client_start(Node, Payloads) || _ <- lists:seq(1, ?MLCM_NO)],
  965:     receive after 1000 * Effort -> ok end,
  966:     [Alias ! {Alias,stop} || {_Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
  967:     Counts =
  968:         [receive
  969:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,{Alias, Count}} ->
  970:                  Count;
  971:              {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
  972:                  exit(Reason)
  973:          end || {Monitor, Alias} <- Clients],
  974:     lists:sum(Counts).
  975: 
  976: mlcm_payloads() ->
  977:     Bin = list_to_binary([rand:uniform(256) - 1 || _ <- lists:seq(1, 512)]),
  978:     lists:foldl(
  979:       fun (N, Payloads) ->
  980:               Payloads#{N => binary:copy(Bin, N)}
  981:       end, #{}, lists:seq(0, 255)).
  982: 
  983: %%-------
  984: 
  985: mlcm_client_start(Node, Payloads) ->
  986:     Parent = self(),
  987:     StartRef = make_ref(),
  988:     {_,Monitor} =
  989:         spawn_monitor(
  990:           fun () ->
  991:                   Alias = alias(),
  992:                   Parent ! {StartRef, Alias},
  993:                   Server = mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias),
  994:                   mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, 0)
  995:           end),
  996:     receive
  997:         {StartRef, Alias} ->
  998:             {Monitor, Alias};
  999:         {'DOWN',Monitor,_,_,Reason} ->
 1000:             exit(Reason)
 1001:     end.
 1002: 
 1003: mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, Seq) ->
 1004:     {Time, Index} = mlcm_rand(),
 1005:     Payload = maps:get(Index, Payloads),
 1006:     receive after Time -> ok end,
 1007:     Server ! {Alias, Seq, Payload},
 1008:     receive
 1009:         {Alias, Seq, Pl} when byte_size(Pl) =:= byte_size(Payload) ->
 1010:             mlcm_client(Alias, Server, Payloads, Seq + 1);
 1011:         {Alias, stop} = Msg ->
 1012:             Server ! Msg,
 1013:             receive after infinity -> ok end
 1014:     end.
 1015: 
 1016: %% Approximate normal distribution Index with an average of 6 uniform bytes
 1017: %% and use the 7:th byte for uniform Time
 1018: mlcm_rand() ->
 1019:     mlcm_rand(6, rand:uniform(1 bsl (1+6)*8) - 1, 0).
 1020: %%
 1021: mlcm_rand(0, X, I) ->
 1022:     Time = X + 1, % 1..256
 1023:     Index = abs((I - 3*256) div 3), % 0..255 upper half or normal distribution
 1024:     {Time, Index};
 1025: mlcm_rand(N, X, I) ->
 1026:     mlcm_rand(N - 1, X bsr 8, I + (X band 255)).
 1027: 
 1028: %%-------
 1029: 
 1030: mlcm_server_start(Node, Alias) ->
 1031:     spawn_link(
 1032:       Node,
 1033:       fun () ->
 1034:               Compute = mlcm_compute_start(Alias),
 1035:               mlcm_server(Alias, 0, Compute)
 1036:       end).
 1037: 
 1038: mlcm_server(Alias, Seq, Compute) ->
 1039:     receive
 1040:         {Alias, Seq, _Payload} = Msg ->
 1041:             Alias ! Msg,
 1042:       mlcm_server(Alias, Seq + 1, Compute);
 1043:         {Alias, stop} = Msg ->
 1044:             Compute ! Msg,
 1045:             receive after infinity -> om end
 1046:     end.
 1047: 
 1048: %%-------
 1049: 
 1050: mlcm_compute_start(Alias) ->
 1051:     spawn_opt(
 1052:       fun () ->
 1053:               rand:seed(exro928ss),
 1054:               mlcm_compute(Alias, 0, 0)
 1055:       end,
 1056:       [link, {priority,low}]).
 1057: 
 1058: mlcm_compute(Alias, State, Count) ->
 1059:     receive {Alias, stop} -> exit({Alias, Count})
 1060:     after 0 -> ok
 1061:     end,
 1062:     mlcm_compute(
 1063:       Alias,
 1064:       %% CPU payload
 1065:       (State +
 1066:            lists:sum([rand:uniform(1 bsl 48) || _ <- lists:seq(1, 999)]))
 1067:           div 1000,
 1068:       Count + 1).
 1069: 
 1070: %%-----------------
 1071: %% Throughput speed
 1072: 
 1073: throughput_0(Config) ->
 1074:     run_nodepair_test(
 1075:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1076:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50000 * Effort, 0)
 1077:       end, Config).
 1078: 
 1079: throughput_64(Config) ->
 1080:     run_nodepair_test(
 1081:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1082:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50000 * Effort, 64)
 1083:       end, Config).
 1084: 
 1085: throughput_1024(Config) ->
 1086:     run_nodepair_test(
 1087:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1088:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 10000 * Effort, 1024)
 1089:       end, Config).
 1090: 
 1091: throughput_4096(Config) ->
 1092:     run_nodepair_test(
 1093:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1094:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 5000 * Effort, 4096)
 1095:       end, Config).
 1096: 
 1097: throughput_16384(Config) ->
 1098:     run_nodepair_test(
 1099:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1100:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 1000 * Effort, 16384)
 1101:       end, Config).
 1102: 
 1103: throughput_65536(Config) ->
 1104:     run_nodepair_test(
 1105:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1106:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 200 * Effort, 65536)
 1107:       end, Config).
 1108: 
 1109: throughput_262144(Config) ->
 1110:     run_nodepair_test(
 1111:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1112:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 50 * Effort, 262144)
 1113:       end, Config).
 1114: 
 1115: throughput_1048576(Config) ->
 1116:     run_nodepair_test(
 1117:       fun (A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB) ->
 1118:               throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, 20 * Effort, 1048576)
 1119:       end, Config).
 1120: 
 1121: throughput(A, B, Prefix, HA, HB, Packets, Size) ->
 1122:     [] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1123:     [] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1124:     MemStart = mem_start(HA, HB),
 1125:     #{time := Time,
 1126:       client_msacc_stats := ClientMsaccStats,
 1127:       client_prof := ClientProf,
 1128:       server_msacc_stats := ServerMsaccStats,
 1129:       server_prof := ServerProf,
 1130:       server_gc_before := Server_GC_Before,
 1131:       server_gc_after := Server_GC_After} =
 1132:         ssl_apply(HA, fun () -> throughput_runner(A, B, Packets, Size) end),
 1133:     [B] = ssl_apply(HA, erlang, nodes, []),
 1134:     [A] = ssl_apply(HB, erlang, nodes, []),
 1135:     {MemA, MemB, MemSuffix} = mem_stop(HA, HB, MemStart),
 1136:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1137:         msacc:print(ClientMsaccStats),
 1138:     Overhead =
 1139:         50 % Distribution protocol headers (empirical) (TLS+=54)
 1140:         + byte_size(erlang:term_to_binary([0|<<>>])), % Benchmark overhead
 1141:     Bytes = Packets * (Size + Overhead),
 1142:     io:format("~w bytes, ~.4g s~n", [Bytes,Time/1000000]),
 1143:     SizeString = integer_to_list(Size),
 1144:     _ = report(
 1145:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem A", MemA, "KByte"),
 1146:     _ = report(
 1147:           Prefix++" Throughput_" ++ SizeString ++ " Mem B", MemB, "KByte"),
 1148:     ClientMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1149:         report(
 1150:           Prefix ++ " Sender_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1151:           round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ClientMsaccStats)
 1152:                 * 1000000 / Bytes),
 1153:           "ps/byte"),
 1154:     ServerMsaccStats =:= undefined orelse
 1155:         begin
 1156:             report(
 1157:               Prefix ++ " Receiver_RelativeCoreLoad_" ++ SizeString,
 1158:               round(msacc:stats(system_runtime, ServerMsaccStats)
 1159:                     * 1000000 / Bytes),
 1160:               "ps/byte"),
 1161:             msacc:print(ServerMsaccStats)
 1162:         end,
 1163:     io:format("******* ClientProf:~n", []), prof_print(ClientProf),
 1164:     io:format("******* ServerProf:~n", []), prof_print(ServerProf),
 1165:     io:format("******* Server GC Before:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_Before]),
 1166:     io:format("******* Server GC After:~n~p~n", [Server_GC_After]),
 1167:     Speed = round((Bytes * 1000000) / (1024 * Time)),
 1168:     report(
 1169:       Prefix ++ " Throughput_" ++ SizeString, Speed, "kB/s " ++ MemSuffix).
 1170: 
 1171: %% Runs on node A and spawns a server on node B
 1172: throughput_runner(A, B, Rounds, Size) ->
 1173:     Payload = payload(Size),
 1174:     [A] = erpc:call(B, erlang, nodes, []),
 1175:     ClientPid = self(),
 1176:     ServerPid =
 1177:         erlang:spawn_opt(
 1178:           B,
 1179:           fun () -> throughput_server(ClientPid, Rounds) end,
 1180:           [{message_queue_data, off_heap}]),
 1181:     ServerMon = erlang:monitor(process, ServerPid),
 1182:     msacc_available() andalso
 1183:         begin
 1184:             msacc:stop(),
 1185:             msacc:reset(),
 1186:             msacc:start(),
 1187:             ok
 1188:         end,
 1189:     prof_start(),
 1190:     #{time := Time} = Result =
 1191:         throughput_client(ServerPid, ServerMon, Payload, Rounds),
 1192:     prof_stop(),
 1193:     MsaccStats =
 1194:         case msacc_available() of
 1195:             true ->
 1196:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1197:                 msacc:stop(),
 1198:                 MStats;
 1199:             false ->
 1200:                 undefined
 1201:         end,
 1202:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1203:     Result#{time := microseconds(Time),
 1204:             client_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1205:             client_prof => Prof}.
 1206: 
 1207: throughput_server(Pid, N) ->
 1208:     GC_Before = get_server_gc_info(),
 1209:     %% dbg:tracer(port, dbg:trace_port(file, "throughput_server_gc.log")),
 1210:     %% dbg:p(TLSDistReceiver, garbage_collection),
 1211:     msacc_available() andalso
 1212:         begin
 1213:             msacc:stop(),
 1214:             msacc:reset(),
 1215:             msacc:start(),
 1216:             ok
 1217:         end,
 1218:     prof_start(),
 1219:     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N).
 1220: 
 1221: throughput_server_loop(_Pid, GC_Before, 0) ->
 1222:     prof_stop(),
 1223:     MsaccStats =
 1224:         case msacc_available() of
 1225:             true ->
 1226:                 msacc:stop(),
 1227:                 MStats = msacc:stats(),
 1228:                 msacc:reset(),
 1229:                 MStats;
 1230:             false ->
 1231:                 undefined
 1232:         end,
 1233:     Prof = prof_end(),
 1234:     %% dbg:flush_trace_port(),
 1235:     exit(#{server_msacc_stats => MsaccStats,
 1236:            server_prof => Prof,
 1237:            server_gc_before => GC_Before,
 1238:            server_gc_after => get_server_gc_info()});
 1239: throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N) ->
 1240:     receive
 1241:         Msg ->
 1242:             case Msg of
 1243:                 {Pid, N, _} ->
 1244:                     throughput_server_loop(Pid, GC_Before, N - 1);
 1245:                 Other ->
 1246:                     erlang:error({self(),?FUNCTION_NAME,Other})
 1247:             end
 1248:     end.
 1249: 
 1250: get_server_gc_info() ->
 1251:     case whereis(ssl_connection_sup_dist) of
 1252:         undefined ->
 1253:             undefined;
 1254:         SupPid ->
 1255:             [{_Id,TLSDistReceiver,_Type,_Modules}|_] =
 1256:                 supervisor:which_children(SupPid),
 1257:             erlang:process_info(
 1258:               TLSDistReceiver, [garbage_collection,garbage_collection_info])
 1259:     end.
 1260: 
 1261: throughput_client(Pid, Mon, Payload, N) ->
 1262:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, start_time()).
 1263: 
 1264: throughput_client_loop(_Pid, Mon, _Payload, 0, StartTime) ->
 1265:     receive
 1266:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, #{} = Result} ->
 1267:             Result#{time => elapsed_time(StartTime)};
 1268:         {'DOWN', Mon, _, _, Other} ->
 1269:             exit(Other)
 1270:     end;
 1271: throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N, StartTime) ->
 1272:     Pid ! {self(), N, Payload},
 1273:     throughput_client_loop(Pid, Mon, Payload, N - 1, StartTime).
 1274: 
 1275: 
 1276: -define(prof, none). % none | cprof | eprof
 1277: 
 1278: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1279: prof_start() ->
 1280:     cprof:stop(),
 1281:     cprof:start(),
 1282:     ok.
 1283: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1284: prof_start() ->
 1285:     catch eprof:stop(),
 1286:     {ok,_} = eprof:start(),
 1287:     profiling = eprof:start_profiling(processes()),
 1288:     ok.
 1289: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1290: prof_start() ->
 1291:     ok.
 1292: -endif.
 1293: 
 1294: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1295: prof_stop() ->
 1296:     cprof:pause(),
 1297:     ok.
 1298: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1299: prof_stop() ->
 1300:     _ = eprof:stop_profiling(),
 1301:     ok.
 1302: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1303: prof_stop() ->
 1304:     ok.
 1305: -endif.
 1306: 
 1307: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1308: prof_end() ->
 1309:     Prof = cprof:analyse(),
 1310:     cprof:stop(),
 1311:     Prof.
 1312: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1313: prof_end() ->
 1314:     eprof:dump_data().
 1315: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1316: prof_end() ->
 1317:     [].
 1318: -endif.
 1319: 
 1320: -if(?prof =:= cprof).
 1321: prof_print(Prof) ->
 1322:     io:format("~p.~n", [Prof]).
 1323: -elif(?prof =:= eprof).
 1324: prof_print(Dump) ->
 1325:     eprof:analyze(undefined, total, [], Dump).
 1326: -elif(?prof =:= none).
 1327: prof_print([]) ->
 1328:     ok.
 1329: -endif.
 1330: 
 1331: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 1332: %%% Test cases helpers
 1333: 
 1334: run_nodepair_test(TestFun, Config) ->
 1335:     A = proplists:get_value({client,1}, Config),
 1336:     B = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
 1337:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_prefix, Config),
 1338:     Effort = proplists:get_value(effort, Config, 1),
 1339:     HA = start_ssl_node({client,1}, Config),
 1340:     try
 1341:         HB = start_ssl_node(server, Config),
 1342:         try TestFun(A, B, Prefix, Effort, HA, HB)
 1343:         after
 1344:             stop_ssl_node(server, HB, Config)
 1345:         end
 1346:     after
 1347:         stop_ssl_node({client,1}, HA, Config)
 1348:     end.
 1349: 
 1350: ssl_apply(Handle, M, F, Args) ->
 1351:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, M, F, Args) of
 1352:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1353:             error(Reason);
 1354:         Result ->
 1355:             Result
 1356:     end.
 1357: 
 1358: ssl_apply(Handle, Fun) ->
 1359:     case ssl_dist_test_lib:apply_on_ssl_node(Handle, Fun) of
 1360:         {'EXIT',Reason} ->
 1361:             error(Reason);
 1362:         Result ->
 1363:             Result
 1364:     end.
 1365: 
 1366: start_ssl_node(Spec, Config) ->
 1367:     start_ssl_node(Spec, Config, 0).
 1368: %%
 1369: start_ssl_node({client, N}, Config, Verbose) ->
 1370:     Name = proplists:get_value({client_name, N}, Config),
 1371:     Args = get_node_args({client_dist_args, N}, Config),
 1372:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1373:     ssl_dist_test_lib:start_ssl_node(
 1374:       Name, "-pa " ++ Pa ++ " +Muacul 0 " ++ Args, Verbose);
 1375: start_ssl_node(server, Config, Verbose) ->
 1376:     Name = proplists:get_value(server_name, Config),
 1377:     Args = get_node_args(server_dist_args, Config),
 1378:     Pa = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1379:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1380:     erpc:call(
 1381:       ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, start_ssl_node,
 1382:       [Name, "-pa " ++ Pa ++ " +Muacul 0 " ++ Args, Verbose]).
 1383: 
 1384: stop_ssl_node({client, _}, HA, _Config) ->
 1385:     ssl_dist_test_lib:stop_ssl_node(HA);
 1386: stop_ssl_node(server, HB, Config) ->
 1387:     ServerNode = proplists:get_value(server_node, Config),
 1388:     erpc:call(ServerNode, ssl_dist_test_lib, stop_ssl_node, [HB]).
 1389: 
 1390: get_node_args(Tag, Config) ->
 1391:     case proplists:get_value(ssl_dist, Config) of
 1392:         true ->
 1393:             case proplists:get_value(ktls, Config, false) of
 1394:                 true ->
 1395:                     "-ssl_dist_opt client_ktls true server_ktls true ";
 1396:                 false ->
 1397:                     ""
 1398:             end ++ proplists:get_value(Tag, Config);
 1399:         false ->
 1400:             proplists:get_value(ssl_dist_args, Config, "")
 1401:     end.
 1402: 
 1403: 
 1404: 
 1405: payload(Size) ->
 1406:     iolist_to_binary(
 1407:       [case Size bsr 8 of
 1408:            0 ->
 1409:                [];
 1410:            Blocks ->
 1411:                payload(Blocks, create_binary(256))
 1412:        end | create_binary(Size band 255)]).
 1413: %%
 1414: payload(0, _) ->
 1415:     [];
 1416: payload(Blocks, Block) ->
 1417:     Half = payload(Blocks bsr 1, Block),
 1418:     [Half, Half |
 1419:      if
 1420:          Blocks band 1 =:= 1 ->
 1421:              Block;
 1422:          true ->
 1423:              []
 1424:      end].
 1425: 
 1426: create_binary(Size) ->
 1427:     create_binary(Size, <<>>).
 1428: %%
 1429: create_binary(0, Bin) ->
 1430:     Bin;
 1431: create_binary(Size, Bin) ->
 1432:     NextSize = Size - 1,
 1433:     create_binary(NextSize, <<Bin/binary, NextSize>>).
 1434: 
 1435: start_time() ->
 1436:     erlang:system_time().
 1437: 
 1438: elapsed_time(StartTime) ->
 1439:     erlang:system_time() - StartTime.
 1440: 
 1441: microseconds(Time) ->
 1442:     erlang:convert_time_unit(Time, native, microsecond).
 1443: 
 1444: report(Name, Value, Suffix) ->
 1445:     ?CT_PAL("~s: ~w ~s", [Name, Value, Suffix]),
 1446:     ct_event:notify(
 1447:       #event{
 1448:          name = benchmark_data,
 1449:          data = [{value, Value}, {suite, "ssl_dist"}, {name, Name}]}),
 1450:     {comment, term_to_string(Value) ++ " " ++ Suffix}.
 1451: 
 1452: term_to_string(Term) ->
 1453:     unicode:characters_to_list(
 1454:       io_lib:write(Term, [{encoding, unicode}])).
 1455: 
 1456: msacc_available() ->
 1457:     msacc:available().
 1458: 
 1459: 
 1460: mem_start(HA, HB) ->
 1461:     MemA = ssl_apply(HA, fun mem/0),
 1462:     MemB = ssl_apply(HB, fun mem/0),
 1463:     {MemA, MemB}.
 1464: 
 1465: mem_stop(HA, HB, Mem1) ->
 1466:     MemA2 = ssl_apply(HA, fun mem/0),
 1467:     MemB2 = ssl_apply(HB, fun mem/0),
 1468:     mem_result(mem_diff(Mem1, {MemA2, MemB2})).
 1469: 
 1470: mem_diff({MemA1, MemB1}, {MemA2, MemB2}) ->
 1471:     {MemA2 - MemA1, MemB2 - MemB1}.
 1472: 
 1473: mem_result({MemDiffA, MemDiffB}) ->
 1474:     MemSuffix =
 1475:         io_lib:format(
 1476:           "~.5g|~.5g MByte", [MemDiffA / (1 bsl 20), MemDiffB / (1 bsl 20)]),
 1477:     {round(MemDiffA / (1 bsl 10)), round(MemDiffB / (1 bsl 10)), MemSuffix}.
 1478: 
 1479: memory(Type) ->
 1480:     try erlang:memory(Type)
 1481:     catch error : notsup ->
 1482:             0
 1483:     end.
 1484: 
 1485: -ifdef(undefined).
 1486: 
 1487: mem() ->
 1488:     lists:foldl(
 1489:       fun ({Type, F}, Acc) ->
 1490:               F*memory(Type) + Acc
 1491:       end, 0,
 1492:       [{total, 1}, {processes, -1}, {atom, -1}, {code, -1},
 1493:        {processes_used, 1}, {atom_used, 1}]).
 1494: 
 1495: -else.
 1496: 
 1497: mem() ->
 1498:     {_Current, _MaxSince, MaxEver} =
 1499:         traverse(
 1500:           fun mem/3,
 1501:           [erlang:system_info({allocator_sizes, Alloc})
 1502:            || Alloc <- erlang:system_info(alloc_util_allocators)],
 1503:           {0, 0, 0}),
 1504:     MaxEver - memory(code). % Kind of assuming code stays allocated
 1505: 
 1506: %% allocator_sizes traversal fun
 1507: mem(
 1508:   T = {instance, _, L}, [], Acc)
 1509:   when is_list(L) ->
 1510:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1511: mem(
 1512:   T = {_, L}, [{instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1513:   when is_list(L) ->
 1514:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1515: mem(
 1516:   T = {blocks, L}, [{_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1517:   when is_list(L) ->
 1518:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1519: mem(
 1520:   T = {_, L}, [{blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}], Acc)
 1521:   when is_list(L) ->
 1522:     {tuple_size(T), Acc};
 1523: mem(
 1524:   {size, Current, MaxSince, MaxEver},
 1525:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1526:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1527:     {0, {C + Current, S + MaxSince, E + MaxEver}};
 1528: mem(
 1529:   {size, Current},
 1530:   [{_, _}, {blocks, _}, {_, _}, {instance, _, _}],
 1531:   {C, S, E}) ->
 1532:     %% Use Current as Max since we do not have any Max values
 1533:     %% XXX future improvement when that gets added to
 1534:     %% erlang:system_info(allocator_sizes, _)
 1535:     {0, {C + Current, S + Current, E + Current}};
 1536: mem(_, _, Acc) ->
 1537:     {0, Acc}.
 1538: 
 1539: %% Traverse (Fold) over all lists in a deep term;
 1540: %% descend into the selected element of a tuple;
 1541: %% record the descent Path and supply it to Fun
 1542: %%
 1543: %% Acc cannot be an integer
 1544: traverse(Fun, Term, Acc) ->
 1545:     traverse(Fun, Term, [], Acc).
 1546: %%
 1547: traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc) ->
 1548:     if
 1549:         is_list(Term) ->
 1550:             traverse_list(Fun, Term, Path, Acc);
 1551:         is_tuple(Term) ->
 1552:             case Fun(Term, Path, Acc) of
 1553:                 {0, NewAcc} ->
 1554:                     NewAcc;
 1555:                 {N, NewAcc} when is_integer(N) ->
 1556:                     traverse(Fun, element(N, Term), [Term | Path], NewAcc)
 1557:             end;
 1558:         true ->
 1559:             Acc
 1560:     end.
 1561: 
 1562: traverse_list(Fun, [Term | Terms], Path, Acc) ->
 1563:     NewAcc = traverse(Fun, Term, Path, Acc),
 1564:     traverse_list(Fun, Terms, Path, NewAcc);
 1565: traverse_list(_Fun, [], _Path, Acc) ->
 1566:     Acc.
 1567: 
 1568: -endif.
